name: Microsoft Azure Storage
description: The Microsoft Azure Storage Connector allows you to access the Azure Storage services using Microsoft Azure Storage Java SDK through WSO2 Micro Integrator (WSO2 MI). Microsoft Azure Storage is a Microsoft-managed cloud service that provides storage that is highly available and secure.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Init operation for ms azure storage connector.

operations.name: listBlobs
operations.description: Gets the list of all blobs.

operations.name: uploadBlob
operations.description: Uploads the blob into the Azure storage.

operations.name: deleteBlob
operations.description: Deletes the blob from the Azure storage.

operations.name: downloadBlob
operations.description: Downloads the blob from the Azure storage.

operations.name: listContainers
operations.description: Gets the list of all containers.

operations.name: createContainer
operations.description: Creates a container into the Azure storage.

operations.name: deleteContainer
operations.description: Deletes the container from the Azure storage.

operations.name: listMetadata
operations.description: Downloads the metadata from the blob from Azure storage.

operations.name: uploadMetadata
operations.description: Uploads metadata to a blob in Azure storage.

connections.name: msazurestorage
connections.description: Connection for accessing Microsoft Azure Storage.
